recipeDescriptionLines.recipeDescriptionLine: Baked fish is a healthy way of cooking your favorite fish with fresh or dried herbs. It is cooked in oven and made with minimum use of oil. The type of herbs not only gives a nice aroma to the dish but also has many health benefits.

Fish in general is very healthy as it contains high protein, omega-3 fatty acids and vitamins D. Omega 3 intake is anyways considered very health as its is associated with decreased risk of chronic dry eye, several types of cancer.

preface: I would have never cooked this recipe at my home until one of our friend cooked for us. We fell in love with this simple, healthy and tasty recipe. I have used Salmon fish in this recipe, but you can use any fish of your choice.

procedureSteps.stepDescription: Wash salmon fillets under running water. Using a fork or toothpick, pierce salmon fillets all over.
Add all the above mentioned ingredients and mix it well. Let it stand for minimum 30 mins.
Meanwhile take a oven pan, put aluminium foil, coat it with little oil. Put fish and bake it for 30 mins. Serve with fresh veggies.

tips.tipDesc: If you have fresh herbs, use them, it enhances the taste.
